thread.title: Top innovations at the 2025 International Builders' Show! Sponsored by Jackery & Schneider Electric
thread.title_full: Top innovations at the 2025 International Builders' Show! Sponsored by Jackery & Schneider Electric

author: Charlotte Today
title: Top innovations at the 2025 International Builders' Show! Sponsored by Jackery & Schneider Electric
text:
CHARLOTTE, N.C. â€” The 2025 International Builders' Show (IBS) in Las Vegas is showcasing the latest and greatest in home design and technology. Home design expert and contributor Kelly Edwards took us on a tour of the standout products at the Schneider Electric and Jackery booths, highlighting innovations that cater to everyone from the average homeowner to professional builders.
Schneider Electric: Revolutionizing Home Energy Management
At IBS, industry leader Schneider Electric unveiled their groundbreaking Schneider Home system. This comprehensive solution integrates solar power, battery storage, EV charging, and utility power management into a single, user-friendly app. The Schneider Home system aims to simplify home energy management, enhance energy efficiency, extend power during outages, and reduce energy bills.
The core of the system is the Schneider Pulse smart electrical panel, which connects seamlessly with other components like the Schneider Boost home battery, Schneider Inverter for solar power, Schneider Charge EV charger, and Schneider X Series smart outlets and light switches. Additionally, the system includes the Schneider Off Grid portable power station, providing energy wherever it's needed.
With rising energy prices and increasing frequency of blackouts, smart energy solutions are more critical than ever. Schneider Home offers a streamlined approach, eliminating the need for multiple apps and disjointed hardware, and putting homeowners back in control of their energy usage.
For more information, visit schneiderhome.com .
Jackery: Essential Home Backup Solutions
In the face of natural disasters and power outages, having a reliable backup power solution is essential. Jackery showcased their Essential Home Backup Kit, the Jackery 5000+, at IBS. This high-capacity solar generator, equipped with a smart transfer switch, integrates seamlessly into a home's electrical system. Unlike traditional gas generators, the Jackery 5000+ is quiet and safe for indoor use.
The kit includes two 500W solar panels, allowing homeowners to generate their own clean power and keep their homes running during extended outages. Whether it's keeping the refrigerator running, maintaining internet connectivity, powering essential medical devices, or simply keeping the lights on, Jackery provides a dependable solution.
For more information, visit jackery.com .
Stay Ahead with the Latest Innovations
The 2025 International Builders Show highlights the importance of innovative solutions in home energy management and backup power. With products like Schneider Home and Jackery's Essential Home Backup Kit, homeowners and builders alike can stay ahead of the curve, ensuring energy efficiency, reliability, and peace of mind.
Stay tuned for more updates and insights from IBS 2025, and explore how these cutting-edge technologies can transform your home.
